segments.text: It's terrible how things have changed . You remember there used to be trees on all these hills .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? There aren't many left now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , they've all been cut down and now all the soil is washing away .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Were there any animals in the forest ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I can remember it very well that there used to be all sorts of animals and birds . But nowadays you just don't see the birds that you used to see around here .
segments.speaker: S1
